name: Cancel Christmas
description:
Hack into Santa's Grotto and delete the Naughty List!

Featuring realistic hacker shenanigans and literally seconds of voice acting!

This was my entry into Ludum Dare 25 which ran from December 14th-17th 2012. The theme was "You are the Villain"
